sentence.Network_en: They have a policy of zero tolerance for sexual harassment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对性骚扰采取绝不容忍的政策。

sentence.Network_en: The Chief Constable said that sexual harassment was deplorable.
sentence.Network_cn: 郡警察局长说性骚扰应受谴责。

sentence.Network_en: Sexual harassment, that's against the law. Something should be done about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 性骚扰是违法的，应该对此采取一些措施。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 关于骚扰（harassment）的话题，经常在网上看到。我们来到一个完全不同的国度，对于骚扰的理解可能和这里职场文化有很大区别…
词根及词缀 ... embodiment n 化身；体现 harassment n 烦恼，骚扰 enactment n （法令）颁布.
《Friends》词汇表B ... chewed vt. 咀爵(食物等)v.咀嚼, 认真考虑 harassment n. 折磨 experiencing n.vt. 经验, 体验, 经历, 阅历.
对这种因升学(thehighschool-to—collegetransition)而导致的生活困扰(harassment)或大学生活适应问题Collegeadjustmentoradaptaaon)国外也有很多研究〔25-291。关于中学.

list.abs: 1.言语的骚扰（verbal harassment）：在言语中带有贬抑任一性别的意味，包括带有性意涵、性别偏见或歧视行为及态度，甚或带有 …
1. 性别骚扰（gender Harassment）：包括一切强化「女性是次等性别」印象的一切言行，以及传达侮辱、诋毁、或性别歧视观念的 …
退款 refund恶性骚扰 malicious harassment网店 online shop
留学新西兰学... ... 骚扰与歧视 Harassment and discrimination 50 种族歧视 Racial Harassment 50 性骚扰 Sexual Harassment 51.

entry.def: Harassment is behaviour which is intended to trouble or annoy someone, for example repeated attacks on them or attempts to cause them problems.

example.ex: Another survey found that 51 per cent of women had experienced some form of sexual harassment in their working lives.
example.tran: 另一个调查发现，51%的女性在工作中曾遭遇过某种形式的性骚扰。

means.word_mean: 1. a feeling of intense annoyance caused by being tormented;

sentences.sentence: "so great was his harassment that he wanted to destroy his tormentors"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of tormenting by continued persistent attacks and criticism

auth_sentence.content: We strongly condemn these acts of censorship and harassment.
auth_sentence.res_content: We strongly condemn these acts of censorship and harassment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We strongly condemn these acts of censorship and harassment.

auth_sentence.content: This was more chilling than any harassment of me.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was more chilling than any harassment of me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was more chilling than any harassment of me.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快
stems_affixes.word_buile: refresh使清新+ment行为或结果等→精力恢复,爽快→点心,饮料
commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]

sentences.en: She often got telephone harassment at night these days.
sentences.cn: 这些天她经常在夜晚受到电话骚扰。
